metadata.name: Telegram API
metadata.description: Monitor crypto Telegram groups and channels for ICM alpha, community sentiment, and early launch signals. Track group activity, member count, and message sentiment.
metadata.author: gICM

tools.name: monitorGroup
tools.description: Monitor messages in a Telegram group or channel

tools.name: searchMessages
tools.description: Search for token mentions or contract addresses

tools.name: getGroupStats
tools.description: Get member count, message frequency, growth rate

tools.name: detectCalls
tools.description: Detect token 'call' messages with contract addresses

tools.name: trackActivity
tools.description: Track message volume and active users

tools.name: getMemberInfo
tools.description: Get member join dates, activity levels

tools.name: sendAlert
tools.description: Send real-time alerts to your personal Telegram

tools.name: getGroupMedia
tools.description: Extract charts, screenshots, and media from messages

steps: Get API ID and Hash from https://my.telegram.org/apps
Add bot to groups you want to monitor (must be admin)

useCases: Monitor alpha groups for new launches
Track community sentiment in official channels
Identify exit signals from community panic

privacy.note: Bot can only access messages in groups where it's added as member. Cannot access private messages of users.
